channel.title: PhoneSpec Pro - Latest Phone News
channel.description: Explore phone specifications, reviews, and comparisons of the latest smartphones.

item.title: Oppo Pad Air 5 Launched With 120Hz Display, Dimensity 7300-Ultra Chip and Huge 10,050 mAh Battery
item.author: Shedrack
item.description: Oppo has officially launched the Pad Air 5 tablet in China.

item.title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra Launches With 1-Inch Sensor, 200MP Periscope Zoom and 6,800mAh Battery
item.author: Shedrack
item.description: Xiaomi has launched the 17 Ultra flagship smartphone.

item.title: Apple to Allow iPhone Users in Brazil to Install Apps and Use Payments Outside the App Store
item.author: Shedrack
item.description: Apple will allow third-party app stores and alternative payments in Brazil.
